entry.title: WIND WARNING , Natashquan

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening then to 70 gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
